full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: Automated Capillary Based Electrophoresis System**
===========================================================

**Reference Number:** WS3742169993-Doc3742203074
--------------------------------------------------------

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
-------------------------

**Competition Type:** Competitive - Open bidding
------------------------

**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
-------------------------------------------

**Description:** The Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC) through the Agassiz Research and Development Centre (ARDC) in Agassiz, British Columbia, invites proposals for the supply and delivery of one high throughput automated capillary based electrophoresis system, ancillary equipment, training, and installation.

**Key Requirements:**

* Supply and delivery of a high throughput automated capillary based electrophoresis system
* Accessories, training, and installation services
* One year depot warranty on all parts and labour
* The contractor's warranty service depot must be located in Canada
* All deliverables must be received no later than March 31, 2023

**Trade Agreements:**

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Procurement Method:**

* Open bidding process

**Selection Criteria:**

* Lowest Price

**Important Dates:**

* Tender Closing Date: 2022-12-08T14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2022-12-12
* Expected Contract End Date: 2023-03-31

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Daphne Yu, PSPC/SPAC
* Email: [daphne.yu@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:daphne.yu@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Bidder Access:**

* Access and download the full Request for Proposal (RFP) and attachments by logging in to your SAP Ariba account at: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14582810

Note: The tender is **expired**, however, I have kept the formatting as you asked for. Please ensure to check with the contracting entity to confirm the current status of the tender. 

 

Let me know if you need anything! I can be reached at teddy.xu@gmail.com.  I am happy to be of assistance, but I would much appreciate if this request were to be discussed only with iac contract [iac-engimoneries.com](http://iac-engimoneries.com). Please kindly refrain from sharing this information. I want to be helpful
